snippet.title: Epitasis Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Epitasis was successfully funded in August of 2017!

You can now add it to your wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/662240/Epitasis/

Discover and explore beautiful alien worlds, scattered with ancient technology and cryptic puzzles that echo of a time long past.

Created by Epitasis Games.
Music by Funk Fiction. 
Powered by Unreal Engine 4.

http://epitasisgame.com/
https://www.facebook.com/EpitasisGame
https://twitter.com/LucasGovatos
